title_narrative: Addressing Explosive Threats for the Protection of Civilians in Yemen
sector_narrative: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
description_narrative: The Project aims to increase resilience for persons affected by explosive contamination in Yemen. Specifically, UNOPS will provide resources for the implementation of the survey and clearance of explosive hazards in Yemen through INGO partners, combined with support to international and national coordination structures.
reporting_org_narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services
participating_org_narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services
